intro.text: Hi! ðŸ‘‹ I'm Yousef, a full-stack developer currently living in Saudi Arabia ðŸ“Œ

text.0: I am very passionate about programming and am always happy to learn new things.
text.1: I'm also a team player and good at collaborating with other developers.
text.2: I have experience using multiple technologies and libraries to create simple and complex applications.
text.3: Please check out the full tech stack

header.2: that I'm most proficient in using.

projects.title: Below, you'll find some of my personal projects and projects that I worked on with a team, along with the stack used in each of them.

expensesManager.title: Expenses Manager
expensesManager.description: This is an application that helps track your expenses and shows simple statistics of your expenses across the different categories.

eKhadamat.title: E-Khadamat
eKhadamat.description: This application helps municipalities in KSA manage their tasks; it has more than four modules, each of which is responsible for helping a different department. Unfortunately, the client doesn't allow me to show a full-demo or the code since it is a private app, but I can show some images and the main page here.

iscopeDownloader.title: iScope Downloader
iscopeDownloader.description: The application was developed to integrate with an existing project management app called iScope iScope is a comprehensive application that facilitates real-time communication and progress tracking among project owners, contractors, and supervising engineers. It also hosts numerous documents related to each project. However, iScope needed to integrate with another program that was not flexible for modifications. Thus, the iScope team had to handle the integration independently. To optimize the process of document management, a tool was developed to download the documents rather than manually downloading them every time a new one is added. This tool also generates an XML file containing data for each document, such as the project name, project ID, and document title.
